long_description: The rugged Leatherman Crater C33x serrated knife offers a straightforward, easy-to-deploy implement with a lightweight, simple design. Size and weight make this knife feel perfect in the palm of your hand. 420HC stainless-steel drop-point blade is serrated and locks securely into place when unfolded. Thumb stud makes 1-handed opening a cinch. Glass-filled nylon handle is durable and offers a great grip. Features a bottle opener, carabiner clip and removable pocket clip. Assembled in the USA with domestic and imported parts.
short_description: The rugged Leatherman Crater C33x serrated knife offers a straightforward, easy-to-deploy implement with a lightweight, simple design.
